title: [Health] E-cigarette use may increase susceptibility to Covid-19. Vapers were five times more likely to be diagnosed with Covid-19 than non-vapers according to analysis of 4,351 vapers, smokers and non-users between 13 and 24 years old.

[Biology] Researchers have discovered a positively charged site located 10nm from the actual binding site on the spike protein. The site allows strong bonding between the SARS-CoV-2 virus protein and the negatively charged human-cell receptors. Their work may decrease the virus' ability to infect humans.
